pageContent: Purpose: To estimate the health system costs of prostate cancer by disease risk category and treatment type over 2016 to 2025 and to identify potential strategies to contain the cost increase.

metaData.source:
Individual and Population Comparisons of Surgery and Radiotherapy Outcomes in Prostate Cancer Using Bayesian Multistate Models
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30707231/
